text: Sphingomonas indica is a Gram-negative, rod-shaped and non-motile bacteria from the genus of Sphingomonas which has been isolated from hexachlorocyclohexane soil from a dump site in Ummari near Lucknow in Uttar Pradesh in India.Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen UniProt == Further reading == * == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Sphingomonas indica at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase indica Category:Bacteria described in 2012
title: Sphingomonas indica
